description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

description.ja: ネコと暮らす不思議な日常。猫創作マンガ

title.en: Mitsuishi-san is Being Weird This Year

altTitles.ja: 今年の三石さんはどこかおかしい

altTitles.zh-hk: 今年的三石同學哪裡有點怪

altTitles.vi: Mitsuishi-san năm nay cứ là lạ

description.en:
A notebook? A jersey!? Gym clothes!?!? What do you want to borrow?

Mitsuishi constantly takes care of her classmate Hajime, a lethargic boy. What made the cool honor student Mitsuishi suddenly change over the past year?

"The 20th Century saw a massive conflict between humans and Monsters, with the Monsters winning the hard-fought struggle. As a new century dawns, memories of those times have utterly faded from the minds of men."  
  
Monsters rule from the shadows, while humans continue life with a semblance of normalcy, all the while in secret fear. Some try to win favor with the Monsters, offering sacrifices of children. Most turn a blind eye and pretend they don't exist. But there are a few, the Melos Warriors, who continue to fight the Monsters and seek the Melody of Oblivion, a mysterious girl said to hold the key to salvation.  
  
Young Serina Bocca awakens as a Melos Warrior and begins his journey in search of the Melody of Oblivion.

title.en: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei - Irotoutoshi-hen

altTitles.ja: ひぐらしのなく頃に令 色尊し編

description.en: Sequel to Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Hoshiwatashi-hen and Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Oniokoshi-hen.

Suzu, an art student in a creative rut, finds new inspiration when she meets a beautiful girl at the park who introduces her to the colourful world of birdwatching.  
  
Serialised monthly in Manga Time Kirara.

The story is loosely based on the Three Kingdoms period, using both real and original characters and events from the historical period in Chinese history and folklore of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
An official slice of life themed 4 panel webmanga of the Guardian Tales series.

title.en: S-Class Hunter Doesn't Want to Be a Villainous Princess

altTitles.ko: S급 헌터는 악역 공녀가 되기 싫습니다

altTitles.ko-ro: S-geup Hunter-neun Agyeok Gongnyeoga Doegi Silseumnida

description.en:
**I'm done with romance, so send me home!**

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.
Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home!
Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?!?!

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

Can I go home......?
description.ko:
**로맨스는 됐으니까 집에나 보내줘!**
김이영, 그녀는 대한민국의 평범한 공무원 시험 응시생이었다.
그것도 4년 반이 넘는 긴 시간동안 공부 끝에 합격한, 낙이라고는 짬짬이 소설읽는 것밖에 없는 정말 평범한 사람.

그러나 합격을 축하하기 위해 외식을 나간 날 교통사고를 당해 죽고, 자신이 읽던 현태판타지 헌터물에 빙의하고 만다.
그런 이영에게 집으로 돌아갈 수 있는 길을 제안하는 '시스템'.
그녀는 오로지 집에 돌아가서 배 따땃하게 지지고 귀여운 말티즈 켈베로스를 끌어안겠다는 일념 하에 수십 번씩 회귀하며 힘을 길렀다.
원작 속의 성좌들과 계약하고 수차례 죽어가며 원작 속의 '탑'을 공략하여 결국 마지막 층의 지배자, 탑의 주인을 처리하는 데 성공한다. 

이제 남은 건 집으로 가는 것 뿐……,


인줄 알았는데!

[오류로 인해 원래 세상으로의 복귀 대신, 작가의 신작에 빙의시켜드리겠습니다!]

필요 없어! 내가 바란건 내 스윗 홈뿐이었는데!
그게 그렇게 어려워?! 탑도 내가 없애줬는데?!?!

게다가, 로맨스 판타지라니! 이전 빙의에서도 로맨스의 ㄹ도, 아니, ㄹ의 한 획도 신경 안 쓰고 살았는데!
거기에 이전처럼 내 몸으로 책에 빙의한 게 아니라 책 속의 '악녀'에 빙의했다!

이 세계의 위협은 전혀 두렵지 않지만, 로맨스를 강제로 끌어내는 퀘스트는 걱정된다. 

나, 집에 갈 수 있을까……?
description.pt-br:
**Estou farta de romance, então me mandem para casa!**

Kim Yi-Young era apenas uma candidata comum ao exame de serviço civil na Coreia do Sul. Depois de estudar por mais de quatro anos e meio, finalmente passou, uma pessoa verdadeiramente comum que só gostava de ler romances de vez em quando como passatempo.

No entanto, no dia em que saiu para uma refeição comemorativa após passar no exame, sofreu um acidente de trânsito e morreu, apenas para se ver reencarnada no romance de caçadora de fantasia que estava lendo.

Para ela, o "Sistema" ofereceu um caminho de volta para casa. Determinada apenas a voltar para casa e abraçar seu gato e o adorável Maltês, Cerberus, ela ganhou força através de dezenas de regressões. Assinando contratos com as constelações da obra original e morrendo várias vezes, eventualmente conseguiu conquistar a "Torre" da obra original e derrotar o dono da torre no último andar.

Agora, tudo o que resta é voltar para casa......

Ou pelo menos era o que ela pensava!

[Devido a um erro, em vez de retornar ao mundo original, vamos reencarná-la na nova obra do autor!]

Eu não preciso disso! Tudo o que eu queria era minha doce casa! É tão difícil assim?! Até me livrei da Torre!?!?!

Além disso, fantasia romântica?! Nem mesmo na minha vida anterior eu me importava com romance, nem um pouco! E para piorar, nem reencarnei em meu próprio corpo desta vez, mas na "vilã" do livro!

Não tenho medo das ameaças deste mundo, mas estou preocupada em ser forçada a uma busca romântica.

Será que posso voltar para casa......?

description.en:
Shigeharu Honda is a Japanese League batter on the rise. His son Goro is a Little League pitcher who one day hopes to follow in his father's footsteps. Momoko Hoshino, Goro's schoolteacher, is the first woman Shigeharu has been interested in since the death of Goro's mother. The destinies of these three individuals will become intertwined as father and son experience both heartbreak and triumph on the baseball diamond. But when an unspeakable tragedy visits the family, it will take everything they have to pick up the pieces and reclaim their dreams.  
  
Won the 41st Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.

title.en: The Duke of Death and His Maid

altTitles.fr: Le duc de la Mort et sa gouvernante obscure

altTitles.ru: Смертоносный герцог и его черная горничная

altTitles.ar: النبيل الشاب حاصد الأرواح و خادمته السوداء

altTitles.ja: 死神坊ちゃんと黒メイド

altTitles.en: The Duke of Death and His Black Maid

description.en:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?
description.tr: Hikâye büyük bir malikanede yaşayan kaderi bir cadı tarafından mühürlenen bir çocuk ve onunla beraber yaşayan hizmetçi Alice hakkında; çocuk dokunduğu her şeyi ölüme sürüklerken; Alice ile hiç el ele tutuşamayacak olmalarına rağmen yaşanan inişli çıkışlı bir aşk.

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!

altTitles.ja: となりのメタラーさん

description.en:
About to freeze to death on a day of heavy snow, Kento is saved by his neighbor Soushi. Dressed all in black, taciturn and scary-looking, Soushi seems hard to approach, but his eyes, almost hidden by his long hair, shine as if pleading for something. After that day, the two of them end up eating together every day for one year. Kento, while hiding the fact that he's gay, doesn't want the peaceful and happy time they share to come to an end. Can he keep a lid on his feelings…?!  

  
This is the story before I welcome the second spring after my encounter with Soushi-san…  
  
Kento, a poor graduate student, is about to be frozen to death on a heavy snowfall day, when he is rescued by his neighbor, Soushi. Soushi might be dressed in all-black, is taciturn, has a fierce gaze, and is hard to approach, but his eyes hidden behind his long hair sway, like he longs to say something. It's been a year since they've been sharing meals together. Kento fears that his days of happiness will come to an end, which is why he hides the fact that he's gay from him.  
But, in the end, will he able to continue to live like this while shutting out his ever growing feelings…?

Low-grade guide, Qin Yun is forcibly marked by divine-grade sentry tyrant Mersherie. An aggressive maiden-heart seme x serious straightforward uke start an unbashful and unabashed companion life, conquering the whole universe while at it.

The "erotic love suspense" manga centers on Hana, who returns to her family after her husband dies. She lives every day in an oppressive atmosphere, until one day her parents start talking about having a marriage interview for her with a globally renowned artist named Aoi.
description.ja: 夫を亡くし、実家に戻った羽菜。息苦しい毎日を送っていたある日、世界的に有名な画家・蒼井重瑠との見合い話が持ち上がる。今の生活から逃れるために、蒼井との再婚を受け入れた羽菜だけど…彼は、前妻3人を殺した連続殺人事件の容疑者で――！？

title.en: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu

altTitles.ja: となりの猫と恋知らず

altTitles.en: The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.
Manga adaptation of the Fate/Grand Order 2020 event: Dance Tournament in the Land of Shadows ~Holy Grail War Between the Bunny and the Cat~.
description.fr: Adaptation manga de l'événement de Fate/Grand Order organisé en 2020 : Dance Tournament in the Land of Shadows ~Holy Grail War Between the Bunny and the Cat~.

title.en: A Cool Older Lady That Makes Me Crazy

altTitles.ja: 僕を狂わすカッコイイお姉さん

altTitles.en: A Cool Older Lady Who Drives Me Crazy

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

---

description.fr:
Jiwoo est un jeune lycéen au bon coeur qui utilise ses réflexes incroyablement rapides pour rendre le monde meilleur, que ce soit en sauvant un petit enfant ou bien un animal de compagnie. Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

敵の不意打ちで深い傷を負い、猫の体に身を隠した覚醒者のカイド。猫好きの主人公・勇羽に助けられるが… 『ノブレス』 X 『少女ザワイルズ』作家らによる爽快アクション！

고양이 몸에 깃든 각성자 카이든과 각성능력을 숨겨온 고등학생 지우

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

---

เรื่องใหม่ของนักเขียน Son Je-ho จาก <โนเบลส> และ Zhena จาก <วีน เหวี่ยง WILD มัธยมสาวพันธุ์ดุ>! แอ็กชันแฟนตาซีสุดน่ารัก เรื่องราวของ "ไคเดน" ผู้มีพลังพิเศษแต่แฝงตัวด้วยการสิงอยู่ในร่างแมว และ "จีอู" นักเรียนหนุ่มทาสแมวแสนธรรมดาที่แอบซ่อนพลังที่ไม่ธรรมดาเอาไว้

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)
description.pt-br:
Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)
- [Official Spanish <Es> Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/eleceed/list?title_no=2642)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2034)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000883)
- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=2861)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)

description.en: The innocent and independent Mian Hua and the cautious and conservative Lan Bao. The two people met coincidentally while one was renting a house. What kind of love sparks will emerge from two people who have very different worldviews, values, ​​and outlooks on life? From the same creator of the fluffy love story <One Minute Underwater>, Bao-Ah. How will she utilize her elegant writing style and an adorable plot to create a “next-door neighbor” type of romantic drama set in Hong Kong…~

In the spring of my third year of middle school, I found Shibata buried beneath a sakura tree. We watched movies and became fast friends, even planned to make a movie together for the school festival...but no one at school seemed to know him. I will discover Shibata and the whole world will turn into Shibata. This is a story of, by, and for Shibata. Now showing in a theater near you.

title.en: I Can’t Sleep With This Sex Animal

altTitles.ja: こんな性獣と寝てはいけない。

description.en: \"The boy that I fell in love with was a beast driven by lust.\" During high school, Aya was brutally rejected by the most troublesome student on campus: Hayate. However, three years later, she meets him again in an unexpected place and becomes his tutor...? The two of them are alone in a locked room, a dangerous area where the sinful smell of lust fills the room...  There's no time for studying when he constantly harasses me! He rubs my nipples so lovingly, and my pussy gets all mushy and tender.... He finally confesses \"I was so happy when you confessed to me,\" making Aya fall into a trance of embarassment and happiness.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order Gouka Kenran Mugetsu Sakuhinshuu

altTitles.ja: Fate/Grand Order 豪華剣爛 霧月作品集

description.en: The collection of FGO works by Mugetsu: featuring three prior works alongside two newly created manga pieces. Additionally, the volume encompasses a significant array of previously published FGO illustrations.

altTitles.en: The Top Couple Is a Bit Sweet

description.en: Song Yan and Wen Li are a well-known contract couple in the entertainment industry. Ever since they are married, they are not in business and have not been tied together. Countless fans lament,  yet many ship them together. That is until the two of them officially announced their participation in a national-level variety show for couples and they reluctantly began to come back to their career. During the recording process of the variety show, the two of them slowly discovered that their bond had already been firmly tied several years ago......

title.en: My Sect's Senior Disciple Has a Hole in His Brain

altTitles.en: There's a Pit in My Senior's Brain
There's Something Wrong with My Da Shixiong's Brain

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Jia Da Shi Xiong Nao Zi You Keng

description.en:
The hilarious adventures of the eldest disciple of a sect who has a problem with his brain. Dong Fang Xian Yun was reincarnated as the most senior disciple of the Carefree sect. But the only thing that goes through his mind is to make sure he doesn't end up dying by the hands of the "main character". Read as he makes no sense to his fellow disciples while avoiding flags left and right.  
  
*Note : Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing, some of chapter combining into one.*

title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya-san Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

description.en: Masachika Kuze sits next to Alya, a girl of Russian and Japanese descent. She’s beautiful, haughty, and an exceptional student, while Masachika is nerdy and known for being a slacker. He’s an easy target for her comments in Russian, which she’s all too happy to translate—except he can understand what she’s really saying!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

description.en: *Attack on Titan* is now available as a four-panel manga! Eren, Mikasa, and Levi turn small and go on a rampage?! Laughter is inevitable!
description.uk:
Хтось каже: «Я люблю Атакуючого Титана!!!»
А хтось: «Мене лякає Атакуючий Титан!»
А ти спробуй прочитати нашу "пародію" у вигляді 4-кома ! Вона знищить кожного, хто тільки зиркне на неї !

description.en:
A college student get's hit by a bus and wakes up in the world of her favourite DatingSim Game " Miracle Lovers " as a side character with no role. Not only is she a mere supporting role, her character is also destined to die, when she turns 18. Can she change her destiny and live peacefully?  
 
If you want to translate my work please ask for permission first.

altTitles.es: Observando el inicio de la primavera

description.en:
Wakamatsu Haruka (3rd year of middle school) finds the new student Hachiya Shuuto (1st year of middle school) sleeping on the train station and Haruka can't help wanting to take care of the small Shuuto.  
  
This is the story of a member of the baseball club and the leader of the school band.

title.en: I Thought She Was a Yandere, but Apparently She's Even Worse

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらもっとヤベー女だった

altTitles.id: Ku kira dia yandere tapi ternyata lebih parah

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレかと思ったらラブコメっぽくなる彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere Ka To Omottara Motto Yabe Onna Datta

altTitles.es-la: Pensé que era una yandere, pero resultó ser una chica mucho más peligrosa.

altTitles.tr: Onun Yandere Olduğunu Sanıyordum Ama Durum Daha Betermiş

description.en:
A man who no longer can turn a blind eye saves a girl who's being bullied by the other classmate, but little did he know.

---

**Notes:**
- There is also a fan colored version and an R18 side(?) story:
description.id: Seorang pria yang tidak lagi bisa menutup mata menyelamatkan seorang gadis yang di-bully oleh teman sekelasnya,tapi sedikit yang dia tahu.
description.tr: Artık sınıf arkadaşının zorbalanmasına göz yumamayan çocuk sınıf arkadaşını kurtarır, oysa...
description.es-la: Psicópata se enamora de un chico normal.

description.en: The Kingdom of Parsemis is a land blessed by an ancient dragon. In this kingdom, the evil Prime Minister Anderheim remembers his past life while his daughter's marriage engagement to the crown prince is being broken. At the same time, he realizes that this world is that of an otome game that he was playing in his past life. In the game, his daughter is the evil fiancée of the crown prince and he is destined to be executed alongside her. Unable to accept this, Anderheim devises a plan to trap the game's conquest targets, who side with the crown prince. Including seducing the honorable leader of the knight's order, who was also his rival...

altTitles.zh-ro: Tā De Shān, Tā De Hǎi

description.en: (Gentle, tenacious honor student and the cold domineering girl) Chi Tang and Youyu are both weirdos in Year 1 Class 2 of high school. They become desk mates, roommates, each other's salvation, protecting the other's warmth. The relationship between the two went from ignorance to understanding. A poem of youth composed.
description.zh: （温柔坚韧学霸&骄横高冷少女）池唐和游余都是高一二班被敬而远之的异类，她们成为同桌和室友，也成为救赎、保护彼此的温暖。两人的感情从懵懂到刻骨，谱写一首青春的诗歌。

description.en: A half-Swedish, half-Japanese girl who seems to have everything except experience with men is using a date coaching app to get used to flirting. However the guy she hits it off with actually uses the same app with a different coach!
description.id:
Renai Daikou (Love Agency) – Agen Cinta
Akasaka Aka x Nishizawa 5mm
Akasaka Aka, yang telah membuat sejarah dalam sejarah komedi romantis dengan “Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen”, kembali dengan komedi romantis baru! Tim baru ini bekerja sama dengan Nishizawa 5mm, seorang pendatang baru yang sedang menjadi topik hangat di dunia manga online! Ini adalah awal dari “komedi
description.ru:
Девушка со шведскими и японскими корнями, у которой, кажется, есть всё, кроме опыта общения противоположным полом, использует приложение для обучения свиданиям, чтобы научиться флиртовать.
Однако парень, с которым у нее завязываются отношения, использует то же приложение с другим тренером!
description.uk:
Ака Акасака, автор "Каґуя-сама хоче, щоб він зізнався їй. Війна сердець та розумів геніїв" та "Дитя улюбленця", презентує свій новий витвір!

У Марі Марії Вінтер-Нанасе, наполовину шведки, наполовину японки, є все, про що можна мріяти. Дівчина виросла в заможній родині закордоном, має багато подруг і вродливу зовнішність. Однак є в ній один недолік: вона не вміє розмовляти з хлопцями!

Узявши в бібліотеці книгу про кохання, у ній вона знайшла підозрілу рекламу. Там йшлося про Агентство Кохання, що надає профі в коханні, який упорається з вашим особистим життям за вас. Після того, як дівчина відсканувала код, з'являється агентка, на ім'я Кон, та обіцяє допомогти Марі зійтися з її коханим. Однак хлопець, що припав їй до душі, Секі Масая, не такий уже й невинний і також користується послугами агентства, щоб почати зустрічатися з нею. Як складеться доля цієї пари?
description.vi: Tác phẩm của Akasaka Aka (tác giả của Oshi no Ko và Kaguya-sama) và Nishizawa 5mm. Một cô gái mang trong mình dòng máu Thụy Điển và Nhật Bản cực kỳ ưu tú nhưng cô ấy lại không có kinh nghiệm với đàn ông. Cô ấy quyết định sử dụng một ứng dụng dịch vụ tình yêu để chinh phục chàng trai ấy. Tuy nhiên, anh chàng mà cô ấy nhắm đến cũng đang sử dụng ứng dụng đó để chinh phục cô!
description.pt-br: Uma garota meio sueca/meio japonesa que parece ter tudo, exceto experiência com homens, está usando um aplicativo de coaching para encontros para se acostumar a flertar. No entanto, o cara com quem ela se dá bem na verdade usa o mesmo aplicativo com um treinador diferente!

title.en: Kono Naka ni Hitori, Ore no Yome ga Iru

altTitles.ja: Kono Naka ni 1-ri, Ore no Yome ga Iru
この中に1人、俺の嫁がいる

altTitles.en: One of them is my wife

description.en:
For the sake of finding clues about his younger twin brother who suddenly went missing, the protagonist changed his identity and infiltrated the academy his brother was attending.

However, what clearly came to light there was a surprising truth! His brother had multiple fiancées...?

(Source: Ganma)
description.id: Souya seorang laki-laki yang menggantikan posisi adiknya yang tiba-tiba menghilang, Terlebih lagi dia menemukan fakta yang mengejutkan bahwa adiknya memiliki banyak tunangan?
description.ja: 突如失踪した双子の弟の手がかりを得る為、入れ替わって学園に潜入することになった主人公。 しかし、そこで明らかになるのは驚愕の事実！ 弟には複数人の婚約者が居て……？

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

description.en:
Masks are art, dance is martial arts!
The despised mask dancer 'Bongsan' follows the map left by his master
To stop the monster tiger 'Saphung Black Tiger' who wants to become king
He sets out on an adventure to find the legendary 'Human Mask'...

altTitles.en: The Bride of the Kyougane Clan

description.en:
The "Kyokane family" is a prestigious family of degenerate magicians that has been in existence for a thousand years. The current head of the family, the eccentric KYOKANE Kuroro, is brought to a bride who has a "secret" behind her pretty appearance,
A bride with a "secret" behind her pretty appearance...?

If you decide to "live together," break off the yoke, the causality, and everything else, and be together!

This marriage battle fantasy, written in a clear and elegant style, is about to begin!
description.ru:
Достопочтенный клан Кëганэ тысячу лет занимался изгнанием демонов. И его нынешний глава, эксцентричный Кëганэ Куро принял невесту, скрывающую большой «секрет»?! Он разрубит ëкаев и саму судьбу ради своего «долго и счастливо»!
Мы представляем вам восхитительно написанное супружеское боевое фэнтези!
description.vi: Gia tộc "Kyougane", gia tộc Pháp Sư Diệt Quỷ huyền thoại đã tiêu diệt cửu vĩ từ hàng nghìn năm trước. Kyoukane Kurou, người đứng đầu gia tộc bây giờ với hàng tá tai tiếng phải lấy vợ. Nhưng cô vợ này không tầm thường và có vài "bí mật" đằng sau vẻ đẹp kiều diễm đó...?

description.en:
The worst dullard enters into the finest prestigious school?
The epitome of ineptitude and the pinnacle of prestigious academia, Runcandel. But even there, there was a painful thorn in the flesh...
The protagonist, the worst dullard who might or might not appear once every few hundred years, Jin Runcandel!
Having long realized his own wretchedness, Jin resolved to live a peaceful life.

However, due to his family's twisted love, he is forcibly enrolled in the prestigious academy, Lapra Rosa!
Encountering the seemingly intriguing (?) cat Murakan, he makes a contract and forms friendships with somewhat eccentric companions.
And then, the conspiracies surrounding him...

Will our protagonist, Jin Runcandel, truly survive the turbulent Lapra Rosa and attain a peaceful life?

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

title.en: Watashi no Hatsukoi wa Hazukashisugite Darenimo Ienai

altTitles.ja: 私の初恋は恥ずかしすぎて誰にも言えない

altTitles.en: My First Love Is Too Embarrassing to Tell Anyone

description.en:
Chiaki is handsome, academically gifted, athletic, and born into a wealthy family with a beautiful sister. Despite his seemingly perfect life, he faces a persistent problem: he's never been lucky in love and struggles to capture the attention of girls. Determined to turn things around in high school, he wakes up one morning to a surprising transformation—he has turned into a girl!

He is shocked to find out that he has lost the appearance he was so proud of, but when he looks in the mirror, he sees a very cute girl in the reflection. He immediately goes to show it off to his twin sister Kaede, who happens to be very popular with the girls, but there is also something very strange happening to her...

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

“Chimeras", creatures that can steal and use the form of any creature except humans. Hunting these creatures are "Hunters", and one of them, Yuri, lives a free-wheeling life. But when she encounters a human-shaped Chimera, something "mysterious" takes rest within her---. These hunters' spear skills will charm you! A super-beast hunting action story!

altTitles.ja: 公爵夫人の秘密のクローゼット

altTitles.zh: 公爵夫人的秘密服装店

description.en:
*How much money must I spend for you to divorce me?!*

Rubika dies in a war without being able to confess her love for Arman but is instead sent back in time. A new life, she will not live in vain. But what are these new obstacles?

---
*'If I had known sooner that life would never wait, I wouldn't have hesitated so much...'*

After living a hard life in the ravaged war ruins, Rubica dies without even confessing to her beloved Armand.

But what is this?

At the age of 22, with Armand’s ring, Rubica returned to the pre-war period. After returning, Rubica tries to find Armand who may be alive but is caught by the proposal of her kingdom's supreme ruler, the Duke of Claymore.

Rubica, who eventually became the duchess because of her greedy uncle and aunt, now plans to squander her husband's fortune, be disgraced as a 'luxurious duchess,’ and get him to divorce her.

However, contrary to what she intended, her fame rises due to her overflowing talent, and her husband, who she thought was indifferent to her, slowly begins to take an interest in her... Where is the end of her luxury, which began to flow in a direction she never expected?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91-%EB%B6%80%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%98-%EB%B9%84%EB%B0%80-%EC%9D%98%EC%83%81%EC%8B%A4/2961), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59782483)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16662/)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119963)
description.pl:
Ile pieniędzy muszę wydać, żebyś się ze mną rozwiódł!? Rubika umiera na wojnie, nie mogąc wyznać swojej miłości do Armana. Nie wiedzieć jak ani czemu cofnęła się w czasie. Otrzymała nowe życie, nie będzie żyła na próżno, ale jakie nowe przeszkody będą stały na jej drodze?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91-%EB%B6%80%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%98-%EB%B9%84%EB%B0%80-%EC%9D%98%EC%83%81%EC%8B%A4/2961), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59782483)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16662/)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119963)
description.zh:
前世到老都没有向爱人表白，卢菲卡重生后，只想找到爱人阿尔芒再续前缘，但是被帝国最高公爵的强制婚约所阻碍。努力败家想要离婚，可越奢侈越爱美，钱却赚得越多！禁欲的婚后生活也越来越暧昧…原来，前世爱人早已陪伴在身边？

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91-%EB%B6%80%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%98-%EB%B9%84%EB%B0%80-%EC%9D%98%EC%83%81%EC%8B%A4/2961), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59782483)

**Official Translations:**

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119963)

title.en: Josou shite Off-Kai ni Sanka shite mita.

altTitles.en: I (♂) Cross-Dressed for the IRL (♀) Meetup

altTitles.ja: 女装してオフ会に参加してみた。

description.en: “Cocoa” has made three best friends in her online game, and she’s excited to meet them in real life at a dessert café for the first time. The only problem: She’s actually a man who’s been lying to them. What begins as a tense manga about online life quickly turns into a lighthearted comedy about friendship, gender, and forgiving yourself and others. [Kodansha]

Kim Seojoon, a freshman college student leading a normal daily life, awoke one day to find himself transported into a fantasy world straight out of a webtoon or web novel or something like that. As he began to get excited about potentially having the role of a male lead character, a shocking event unfolded before his eyes—a murder of an imperial family. Consequently, Kim Seojoon found himself imprisoned in the world's prison, 'Gehenna'. Will he be able to navigate the treacherous paths of this unfamiliar world?

the Grand Hybrid, born from the union of angels and demons, is believed to possess the highest lineage among hybrids. When awakened, this extraordinary being, known as the ‘Apex Hybrid’, is said to have the power to blow up the universe.

Contrary to Jake’s desire for a simple and ordinary life, angels and devils eventually seek him out as the ultimate ‘Apex Hybrid’. They employ various strategies to convince him to join their respective sides.

altTitles.en: ソードアート・オンライン コミックアンソロ ジー

description.en: The Sword Art Online Comic Anthology is a comic anthology of Sword Art Online-themed short, independent manga stories by various illustrators, published under the Dengeki Comics imprint.

Mizoshiri Shohei has just been assigned to the organized crime division and has already developed a crush on his senpai, experienced detective Hino Toranosuke. But when Hino gets shot, Mizo feels responsible and decides to take drastic measures.
The handsome and affectionate pilot Zhou Jingze x the gentle and firm doctor Xu Sui. Summer is always hot, and so is the boy I love. Watch "Infatuated Prodigal Son" Zhou Jingze perform this role.
description.zh: 痞帅深情飞行员周京泽x温软坚定医生许随。夏天永远热烈，我爱的少年也是。看“痴情浪子”周京泽演绎这一份情有独钟。
